title: Fishing Feasts
author: Chef Elarius
pages: The secrets of the sea unfold under the humble fishing rod. Patience is your greatest ingredient.
Cook raw fish in a furnace with coal for perfectly cooked salmon or cod.
A bowl of cooked fish restores hunger, fortifying you for further exploration.
Pufferfish is a delicacy, yet dangerous if unprepared. Avoid consumption unless brewing potions.
Catch tropical fish to craft a colorful aquarium. Though not edible, they bring joy to your abode.
Mastery of sea cuisines will establish your renown as a top chef.
